climate: ranges from steppes in the south through humid continental in much of European Russia; subarctic in Siberia to tundra climate in the polar north; winters vary from cool along Black Sea coast to frigid in Siberia; summers vary from warm in the steppes to cool along Arctic coast
exports: and a wide variety of civilian and military manufactures
industries: complete range of mining and extractive industries producing coal
and metals; all forms of machine building from rolling mills to high-performance aircraft and space vehicles; defense industries (including radar
shipbuilding; road and rail transportation equipment; communications equipment; agricultural machinery
and construction equipment; electric power generating and transmitting equipment; medical and scientific instruments; consumer durables
natural_resources: wide natural resource base including major deposits of oil
